plot: A visit from Sid's grandfather causes chaos for both him and his dad. His overbearing grandfather is still under the impression that Sid's parents are still together, a pretense Sid's dad is all too eager to maintain. The stresses and strains of the visit soon mount up and eventually something has to give.—Headblade

Sid is distraught without his best friend Tony and tries to contact his girlfriend Cassie. Upon misinterpreting Cassie's closeness with her gay friends in Scotland, Sid seeks his Dad's advice, but he is preoccupied with cleaning the house for Sid's grandfathers visit.—Lol_Limewire
